properties.areaDesc: Southern Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Central Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 7 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
At 558 PM EST...An area of heavy snow was moving across northern
Maine.  The snow will be mixed with sleet and freezing rain in
spots.

Locations impacted include...
Houlton, Millinocket, Patten, Danforth, Mount Katahdin, East
Millinocket, Medway, Hodgdon, Sherman, Island Falls, Smyrna,
Springfield, Amity, Topsfield, Mount Chase, Haynesville, South Branch
Pond, Dudley Township, White Cap Mountain and Ebeemee.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 95 between mile markers 229 and 303.
US Highway 1 between Topsfield and Monticello.
State Highway 11 between West Seboeis and Knowles Corner.

* Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy
snow.

* Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in
this area of heavy snow.

* Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are
possible in this area of heavy snow.

NWSheadline: An area of heavy snow will affect northwestern Washington...east central Piscataquis...southeastern Aroostook and northeastern Penobscot Counties
